bibl.title: Greeks and Non-Greeks.
bibl.note: See in part. pp. 308-312: the relationship between Greeks and Egyptians in Ptolemaic Egypt (in the light of the so-called "Alexander Romance").

bibl.title: The Cambridge Companion to the Hellenistic World

bibl.seg: GRUEN Erich S., Greeks and Non-Greeks.
Glenn R. BUGH (Ed.), The Cambridge Companion to the Hellenistic World (Cambridge, 2006) pp. 295-314.
See in part. pp. 308-312: the relationship between Greeks and Egyptians in Ptolemaic Egypt (in the light of the so-called "Alexander Romance").
